title: Atavus
description: Traditions and family history are chronicled in a tome by an elder Giacanti. What stories are told about the dead that has an enforcer on a murderous rampage to conceal? A Mafia Donna is reading the tales, and what will she uncover in the contents that a killer Protezione does not want revealed? Read the bestselling crime saga, hailed as a 'socks off gritty read' and 'a killer great series'!
author: S.W. Frank
